name: PDF, Adobe Geospatial Encoding (PDF Version 1.7, ExtensionLevel 3)

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

description: Geographical markup within PDF documents, introduced in extension to PDF 1.7 (equivalent to ISO 32000-1:2008) published by Adobe Systems Incorporated in June 2008 in association with release of Acrobat 9.0.
